text: Enok, ana Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgim, Fhe Bakɨme ana ndigap, Hevenan ndagi. Ana rimgi fhuvara. Kha gumgi ana nzuav garav, mbe ana gangi fhuvara. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme ana ndigi. Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme zumgum Enok ndigi. Enok, ana fara kha nuianan kav, anan tɨvi Fhe Bakɨme nɨman guigira nzerigi. Fhe Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgiap anan ndikndigi.
